name: Star Wars Jedi Knight: Mysteries of the Sith
summary: The single-player story is set five years after the events of Dark Forces II. The player controls Kyle Katarn, protagonist of Star Wars: Dark Forces and Dark Forces II, and later in the game, Mara Jade, one of the most popular Star Wars expanded universe characters.
info:
• 中文名: 星球大战绝地武士：西斯之谜
  • 开发: LucasArts
  • 发行: Disney Interactive Studios、LucasArts

  • 游戏类型: FPS
  • 游戏引擎: Sith
  • 游玩人数: 单人/多人
  • 发行日期: 1998-02-17
